item.description:
OK, this is not a real meetup, but it could turn into a personal visit from Dr Paul! Donate to Dr Paul and designate our meetup group. If we donate the most money, he'll come visit! We have a real shot at this since we are one of the biggest meetup groups out there. The deadline is Aug 31st, but the sooner the better. Once you donate, then RSVP on this board so we can see how many people have done it (no need to disclose the amount, unless you want to). Also, feel free to go get your friends and family to donate on behalf of our group.

To donate, click here. That should put MU0006 into the code for our meetup group. To track the progress go to www.ronpaul2008.com/meetup.

With something like 30,000 meetup members, if people donate $100 on average, that would result in $3M in just a couple of weeks!!!!
item.name: Donate to get Ron Out Here
